body.p:
Owenton Ky Feb 11th/64
To his Excellency the Governor
Sir

A Young man named Schouler was arrested in this county by a party of soldiers who went to Frankfort with Major Mahoney against who whom there are no charges which would justify either the arrest or detention

I have this from most reliable Union men -- Malice had more to do with it ^probably^ than any thing else
The young man was taken to Frankfort with other Prisoners and we hope you will have him released
His Father and friends generally are good citizens

Owenton Ky Feby 11th 1864
C. B. Snell
In regard to release of prisoner (Schuler)
answered that no such man is prisoner here.
Recd I. G. O. Feby 13th 1864
